archdesc.bioghist: Detroit chapter of Parents, Families and Friends of Lesbians and Gays (also called P-FLAG) established in 1986 by Bill and Harriet Dart as an informational support group.
archdesc.scopecontent: Records of organization include minutes, financial reports, newsletters, photographs, video cassette recordings, correspondence, promotional materials, clippings, and photographs.
